Wisdom: تَدَبَّرُوا آيَاتِ الْقُرْآنِ وَاعْتَبِرُوا بِهِ فَإِنَّهُ أَبْلَغُ الْعِبَرِ
enWisdom: Reflect upon the verses of the Qur’an and learn lessons from it, for indeed it is the best imparter of lessons

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِهَذَا الْقُرْآنِ أَحِلُّوا حَلَالَهُ وَحَرِّمُوا حَرَامَهُ وَاعْمَلُوا بِمُحْكَمِهِ [بِحُكْمِهِ‏] وَرُدُّوا مُتَشَابِهَهُ إِلَى عَالِمِهِ فَإِنَّهُ شَاهِدٌ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَفْضَلُ مَا بِهِ تَوَسَّلْتُمْ
enWisdom: You must take this Qur’an, accept what it has permitted, stay away from what it has forbidden, act on its definitive [and clear] verses and refer its unclear verses to the one who knows their meanings; for indeed it is a witness over you, and it is the best thing that you can petition with
